metadata.title: CVE-2018-17780 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: Telegram Desktop (aka tdesktop) 1.3.14, and Telegram 3.3.0.0 WP8.1 onWindows, leaks end-user public and private IP addresses during a callbecause of an unsafe default behavior in which P2P connections are acceptedfrom clients outside of the My Contacts list.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
